title: Authoritarian regimes lack rule of law

content.prompt: In a comparison of authoritarian and democratic regimes, it is accurate to say authoritarian regimes

choices.label: are more likely to be characterized by strong civil societies
tend to be more inefficient decision makers
are unstable and therefore more likely to be short-term

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
